title: Kaiki Kanzume
sinopse:
This is a compilation of select stories from the Ito Junji Kyoufu Manga Collection.

1. Nakama no Ie
2. Namekuji Shoujo
3. Tonari no Mado
4. Hyouchakumono
5. Gosenzo-sama
6. Ijou Sekkin: Near-Miss
7. Kaiki Hikizuri Kyoudai◎Jijo no Koibito
8. Kaiki Hikizuri Kyoudai◎Koureikai
